class.name: SQLite3Statement
class.description: This class wraps the sqlite3_stmt* handle and provides methods for binding parameters, executing statements, and retrieving results. It corresponds to the SQLite3 prepared statement API.

method.name: sql
method.description: Returns the original SQL text used to prepare the statement.

method.name: expanded_sql
method.description: Returns the SQL text with bound parameters expanded.

method.name: readonly
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the statement makes no direct changes to the database.

method.name: isexplain
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the statement is an EXPLAIN or EXPLAIN QUERY PLAN statement.

method.name: explain
method.description: Sets the EXPLAIN mode for the statement. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: busy
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the statement is currently executing.

method.name: bind_blob
method.description: Binds a blob value to a parameter. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: bind_blob64
method.description: Binds a large blob value to a parameter. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: bind_double
method.description: Binds a double value to a parameter. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: bind_int
method.description: Binds an integer value to a parameter. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: bind_int64
method.description: Binds a 64-bit integer value to a parameter. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: bind_null
method.description: Binds a NULL value to a parameter. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: bind_text
method.description: Binds a text value to a parameter. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: bind_text16
method.description: Binds a UTF-16 text value to a parameter. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: bind_text64
method.description: Binds a text value with encoding specification. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: bind_value
method.description: Binds a variant value to a parameter, automatically choosing the appropriate type. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: bind_zeroblob
method.description: Binds a zero-filled blob of the specified length. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: bind_zeroblob64
method.description: Binds a large zero-filled blob of the specified length. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: bind_parameter_count
method.description: Returns the number of parameters in the prepared statement.

method.name: bind_parameter_name
method.description: Returns the name of the parameter at the given index.

method.name: bind_parameter_index
method.description: Returns the index of the parameter with the given name.

method.name: clear_bindings
method.description: Clears all parameter bindings. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: step
method.description: Evaluates the prepared statement. Returns [code]SQLITE_ROW[/code] if there is another row, [code]SQLITE_DONE[/code] if finished, or an error code.

method.name: data_count
method.description: Returns the number of columns in the result set.

method.name: finalize
method.description: Destroys the prepared statement. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: reset
method.description: Resets the prepared statement to its initial state. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: column_blob
method.description: Returns the blob value of the specified column.

method.name: column_double
method.description: Returns the double value of the specified column.

method.name: column_int
method.description: Returns the integer value of the specified column.

method.name: column_int64
method.description: Returns the 64-bit integer value of the specified column.

method.name: column_text
method.description: Returns the text value of the specified column.

method.name: column_text16
method.description: Returns the UTF-16 text value of the specified column.

method.name: column_value
method.description: Returns the value of the specified column as a variant.

method.name: column_bytes
method.description: Returns the size in bytes of the specified column's value.

method.name: column_bytes16
method.description: Returns the size in bytes of the specified column's UTF-16 value.

method.name: column_type
method.description: Returns the data type of the specified column.

method.name: column_count
method.description: Returns the number of columns in the result set.

method.name: column_name
method.description: Returns the name of the specified column.

method.name: column_name16
method.description: Returns the UTF-16 name of the specified column.

method.name: column_database_name
method.description: Returns the database name for the specified column.

method.name: column_database_name16
method.description: Returns the UTF-16 database name for the specified column.

method.name: column_table_name
method.description: Returns the table name for the specified column.

method.name: column_table_name16
method.description: Returns the UTF-16 table name for the specified column.

method.name: column_origin_name
method.description: Returns the origin name for the specified column.

method.name: column_origin_name16
method.description: Returns the UTF-16 origin name for the specified column.

method.name: column_decltype
method.description: Returns the declared type for the specified column.

method.name: column_decltype16
method.description: Returns the UTF-16 declared type for the specified column.

method.name: stmt_status
method.description: Returns status information about the prepared statement.
